_aChangeLog.text: Improved Bot's movement through the ventilation duct

_sText:
Counter-Strike: Source : Bot's Navigation Mesh for the map CS_MEATLIGHT

Nav Creator: Meurglis3, Release Date: December 20 2013

Here is the Navigation Mesh for fine small office/assault themed map cs_meatlight by Chris (released November 2008). It's an almost fully created from scratch and totally hand-tuned .nav-file ('cause in original map author's .bsp-file was embedded a simple auto-gen).

Most areas were tuned manually (also some paths were created from scratch) because during an auto-generation processing the majority of them were constructed incorrectly or incomplete. Some missed pathways were adjusted properly (in particular ladders to the balcony of office and to path through the ventilation system).

Now, after manually reworking of nearly 80% of an auto-generated Navigation Mesh, bots have opportunity to use ALL walkable ways and surely move on ALL space of the map. Even despite getting in the way office chairs and coffee tables for which destruction they should spend precious cartridges :D

Also this Navigation Mesh is fully Place Painted.

NOTE: For possibility of comparison and in-game testing the original navigation file by map creator available to downloading with the same map.

Well... play and enjoy! Also don't forget to write responses and remarks in essence ;-)

Credits and Gratitudes: Chris (for high detailed, very realistic and combat-friendly map).

Additional Gratitudes: BarnDoor (for perfect playable navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps), Chizbone (for informative and clever article BOT_BRAINED and a set of excellent navigation meshes), CoCoNUT (for fine hand-tuned navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps), Valve Developer Community (for its learning articles by Navigation Meshes and Navigation Mesh Commands).

Happy Frags and Good Luck!
